Package main.java.photos.controllers

Class ParentController

java.lang.Object
main.java.photos.controllers.ParentController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminController, AlbumController, LoginController, PhotoController
public class ParentController extends Object
This controller will share the common functions between all controllers. We also created this controller to store the global User, and active Stage (app window).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rohan Deshpande, Saman Sathenjeri
